alert.note: Alert for Northern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Piscataquis and north central Penobscot Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Katahdin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Katahdin, Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Baxter State Park and Katahdin Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
